title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0006

segments.en: Hello everyone and welcome to EnglishPod.
My name is Marco.
And I'm Erika.
How are you, Erika?
Marco, I'm doing really well.
How about you?
I'm doing great.
I'm really excited because today we're talking about travel.
segments.cn: 我很兴奋，因为今天我们要谈论旅行。

segments.en: That's right.
We're gonna give you some real English to talk about travel.
segments.cn: 我们将给你一些关于旅行的真实英语。

segments.en: Exactly.
English that you would use in everyday life that you hear in movies and TV shows.
segments.cn: 日常生活中你会用到的英语，电影和电视节目中听到的。

segments.en: English people actually use.
Exactly.
So why don't you tell us a little bit about this lesson for today.
segments.cn: 那么，为什么不告诉我们今天这节课的内容呢？

segments.en: Okay, so today we are going to listen as a husband and wife get ready to go on a trip.
segments.cn: 好的，今天我们将听一对夫妻准备去旅行。

segments.en: Alright, that sounds a little bit complicated.
segments.cn: 好吧，这听起来有点复杂。

segments.en: Uh-huh.
Well, let's look at our two preview words.
segments.cn: 那么，让我们看看我们的两个预览词。

segments.en: Okay, so the first word that we have is road trip.
segments.cn: 好的，第一个词是公路旅行。

segments.en: Road trip.
Road trip.
Road trip.
Okay, so road trips are really fun and interesting, right?
segments.cn: 好的，公路旅行真的很有趣，对吧？

segments.en: Road trips are great.
You get to get in a car with your family and drive on a vacation.
segments.cn: 你可以和家人一起开车去度假。

segments.en: Yeah, those are really fun and they're really popular in North America.
segments.cn: 是的，这些旅行真的很有趣，在北美非常受欢迎。

segments.en: Really popular.
I've been on a million road trips.
segments.cn: 我已经参加过无数次公路旅行。

segments.en: Alright, we'll talk about that a little bit later on.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们稍后再谈这个。

segments.en: But now let's take a look at our second word and it's the cars packed.
segments.cn: 但现在让我们看看第二个词，就是车子装满了。

segments.en: The cars packed.
The cars packed.
The car is packed.
So when your car is packed it means that...
segments.cn: 所以当你的车装满时，意味着...

segments.en: Everything you need is inside the car.
segments.cn: 你需要的一切都在车里。

segments.en: Alright, so your bags, your food, everything that you need for your trip.
segments.cn: 好的，你的行李、食物、旅行所需的一切。

segments.en: Perfect.
Okay, so those were our two preview words and now we are ready to listen to the dialogue for the first time.
segments.cn: 好的，这就是我们的两个预览词，现在我们准备第一次听对话。

segments.en: Okay, this dialogue will be at normal speed.
segments.cn: 好的，这段对话将以正常速度进行。

segments.en: It will be fast.
But don't worry if you don't understand everything.
segments.cn: 但如果你不理解所有内容也不用担心。

segments.en: After 10 minutes we promise you will understand everything in this lesson.
segments.cn: 10分钟后我们保证你会理解这节课的所有内容。

segments.en: So, are we all ready to go?
segments.cn: 所以，我们都准备好出发了吗？

segments.en: Yup, I think so.
The car is packed, we have munchies and music and the map is in the car.
segments.cn: 车子装满了，我们有零食和音乐，地图也在车里。

segments.en: Did you get the camera?
Got it.
Did you fill up the tank?
Yup, it's all set.
You're sure we're not forgetting anything?
segments.cn: 你确定我们没有忘记什么吗？

segments.en: I'm sure.
We've got all our bases covered.
Well, let's get going then.
I love road trips.
Hmm, do you think we can make a pit stop?
segments.cn: 嗯，你觉得我们可以停一下吗？

segments.en: But we've only been on the road for 10 minutes.
I know, but I forgot to go to the bathroom before we left.
segments.cn: 我知道，但我在出发前忘了上厕所。

segments.en: Well, she forgot to go to the bathroom.
Yeah, I hate it when this happens.
This happens to me on almost every road trip.
segments.cn: 这种情况几乎在每次公路旅行中都会发生。

segments.en: Okay, great.
So now it's time for our language takeaway.
segments.cn: 现在是我们语言要点的时间。

segments.en: We have three words for our language takeaway today.
segments.cn: 今天我们有三个词作为语言要点。

segments.en: Language takeaway.
And the first word is munchies.
Munchies.
Munchies.
So munchies are?
Snacks.
Snacks, food.
Food, chips.
Chips, cookies.
Chocolate bars.
All that good stuff.
I love munchies.
And they're really good when you're taking a road trip.
segments.cn: 在公路旅行时它们真的很好。

segments.en: Indeed.
Okay, so let's take a look at our second language takeaway word for today.
segments.cn: 好的，现在让我们看看今天的第二个语言要点词。

segments.en: And it is fill up the tank.
So this is to?
Put gas in your car.
Put gas in the gas tank.
In the gas tank, exactly.
Alright, our last language takeaway today is?
segments.cn: 好的，今天最后一个语言要点是？

segments.en: Pit stop.
Pit stop.
Pit stop.
Make a pit stop.
It's a quick stop for you to get some gas, food, go to the bathroom.
segments.cn: 这是一个快速停靠，让你加油、吃东西、上厕所。

segments.en: Yeah, a pit stop.
A quick stop.
Great, so now it's time for putting it together.
segments.cn: 很好，现在是整合的时间。

segments.en: Putting it together.
Okay, so we have two great phrases for you today.
segments.cn: 好的，今天我们有两个很棒的短语。

segments.en: Let's take a look at the first one.
We've got all our bases covered.
We've got all our bases covered.
We've got all our bases covered.
This is a really great phrase and it's really useful, right?
segments.cn: 这是一个非常好的短语，非常有用，对吧？

segments.en: Yeah, let's listen to a couple of examples.
segments.cn: 是的，让我们听几个例子。

segments.en: Example one.
We've got all our bases covered in case the hurricane hits.
segments.cn: 如果飓风来袭，我们已经准备好了。

segments.en: Example two.
Okay, I have my keys, wallet, and passport.
segments.cn: 好的，我有我的钥匙、钱包和护照。

segments.en: Looks like I have all my bases covered.
Okay, it's clear now, but you can use this in a lot of different situations, right?
segments.cn: 好的，现在很清楚了，但你可以在很多不同的情况下使用这个，对吧？

segments.en: You can use this in many situations.
segments.cn: 你可以在许多情况下使用这个。

segments.en: If I'm at work, I could say, Alright, we've got a really good marketing plan.
segments.cn: 如果我在工作，我可以说，好的，我们有一个很好的营销计划。

segments.en: We've got all our bases covered.
Exactly, you have everything ready.
segments.cn: 正是如此，你一切都准备好了。

segments.en: You're all prepared.
Perfect, alright.
Now let's take a look at our second phrase and it's Let's get going.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看第二个短语，"让我们开始吧"。

segments.en: Let's get going.
Let's get going.
Let's get going.
Alright, so when you say let's get going, it just means... Let's start.
segments.cn: 好的，当你说"让我们开始吧"，这意味着... 让我们开始。

segments.en: Let's start, let's go.
Okay, but the interesting thing about this phrase is you can change it a little bit and it means something different.
segments.cn: 好的，但这个短语有趣的地方是你可以稍微改变一下，它的意思就不同了。

segments.en: Uh -huh, let's listen to a couple of examples.
Example one.
I have the chicken, so let's get cooking.
segments.cn: 我有鸡肉，所以让我们开始做饭。

segments.en: Example two.
This house is really scary.
Let's get out of here.
Example three.
I have another meeting in 20 minutes, so let's get down to business.
segments.cn: 我20分钟后还有一个会议，所以让我们开始工作。

segments.en: So let's get down to business, Marco.
Let's get down to business.
Let's listen to the dialogue one more time, but this time... It'll be a little bit slower, and you'll understand much better.
segments.cn: 让我们再听一次对话，但这次... 会慢一点，你会理解得更好。

segments.en: So, are we all ready to go?
segments.cn: 所以，我们都准备好出发了吗？

segments.en: Yep, I think so.
The car's packed, we have munchies and music, and the map's in the car.
segments.cn: 车已经装好了，我们有零食和音乐，地图在车里。

segments.en: Did you get the camera?
Got it.
Did you fill up the tank?
Yep, it's all set.
You're sure we're not forgetting anything?
segments.cn: 你确定我们没有忘记什么吗？

segments.en: I'm sure.
We've got all our bases covered.
Well, let's get going then.
I love road trips.
Um, do you think we can make a pit stop?
segments.cn: 嗯，你觉得我们可以停一下吗？

segments.en: But we've only been on the road for 10 minutes.
I know, but I forgot to go to the bathroom before we left.
segments.cn: 我知道，但我在出发前忘了上厕所。

segments.en: So that was a little more clear this time, wasn't it?
segments.cn: 所以这次更清楚了，不是吗？

segments.en: Yeah, you can definitely understand better about what we've been talking about.
segments.cn: 是的，你肯定能更好地理解我们在谈论的内容。

segments.en: Yep.
Okay, so now it's time to look at Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 好的，现在是时候看看流利度提升器了。

segments.en: Erica, why don't you explain what Fluency Builder is?
segments.cn: Erica，你能解释一下流利度提升器是什么吗？

segments.en: In Fluency Builder, we give you some great useful phrases to help you express your ideas clearly.
segments.cn: 在流利度提升器中，我们给你一些很有用的短语，帮助你清晰地表达你的想法。

segments.en: Okay, great.
So let's look at Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 那么让我们看看流利度提升器。

segments.en: Fluency Builder Alright, so we all know how to ask the question, Are we ready to go?
segments.cn: 流利度提升器 好吧，我们都知道如何问这个问题，"我们准备好出发了吗？"

segments.en: That's right.
You can say, Can we go now?
segments.cn: 你可以说，"我们现在可以走了吗？"

segments.en: Or you can say, Are we ready to go?
segments.cn: 或者你可以说，"我们准备好出发了吗？"

segments.en: Exactly.
But there's another way that we can say this, and we heard it in our dialogue.
segments.cn: 但还有另一种说法，我们在对话中听到了。

segments.en: So, let's listen.
So, are we all ready to go?
segments.cn: 所以，我们都准备好出发了吗？

segments.en: So, are we all ready to go?
segments.cn: 所以，我们都准备好出发了吗？

segments.en: Wow, that sounds really good.
It sounds a lot more fluent.
Fluent, exactly.
Okay, so another simple phrase that we all know how to say is, It is ready.
segments.cn: 好的，另一个我们都知道怎么说的简单短语是，"它准备好了"。

segments.en: It is prepared.
It is ready.
Right.
So these examples are fine.
They're right.
Yeah, they're correct English, no problem.
segments.cn: 是的，它们是正确的英语，没问题。

segments.en: But there's another way to say this that we heard in the dialogue, and it sounds a lot more fluent.
segments.cn: 但还有另一种说法，我们在对话中听到了，听起来更流利。

segments.en: Yep, it's all set.
Yep, it's all set.
It's all set.
That sounds much better.
Yes, and we're all set to listen to this dialogue for a third time, and this time it's going to be at its normal speed.
segments.cn: 是的，我们都准备好听第三次对话了，这次会是正常速度。

segments.en: So, are we all ready to go?
segments.cn: 所以，我们都准备好出发了吗？

segments.en: Yep, I think so.
The car's packed, we have munchies and music, and the map's in the car.
segments.cn: 车已经装好了，我们有零食和音乐，地图在车里。

segments.en: Did you get the camera?
Got it.
Did you fill up the tank?
Yep, it's all set.
You're sure we're not forgetting anything?
segments.cn: 你确定我们没有忘记什么吗？

segments.en: I'm sure.
We've got all our bases covered.
Well, let's get going then.
I love road trips.
Do you think we can make a pit stop?
segments.cn: 你觉得我们可以停一下吗？

segments.en: But we've only been on the road for ten minutes.
I know, but I forgot to go to the bathroom before we left.
segments.cn: 我知道，但我在出发前忘了上厕所。

segments.en: So Erica, you said you've been on a million road trips.
segments.cn: 所以Erica，你说你已经进行了无数次公路旅行。

segments.en: What was that all about?
Where have you been?
Okay, well maybe not a million road trips, but many road trips.
segments.cn: 好吧，也许不是一百万次公路旅行，但很多次。

segments.en: Every summer, I used to go on a road trip with my family, and we would drive many, many hours, probably eight hours in one day, up to northern Canada.
segments.cn: 每年夏天，我和家人会去公路旅行，我们会开车很多小时，可能一天开八小时，去加拿大北部。

segments.en: Oh wow, nice.
Yeah, and then we would go camping, and we would sleep outside, and we would have a campfire at night.
segments.cn: 是啊，然后我们会去露营，睡在外面，晚上有篝火。

segments.en: It was great.
Ah, family road trip.
Yeah, but maybe eight hours in a car is a little too long.
segments.cn: 是啊，但在车里待八小时有点太长了。

segments.en: Well, yeah.
Well, I've been on a different kind of road trip with some buddies of mine, some friends.
segments.cn: 我和一些朋友去过不同类型的公路旅行。

segments.en: We would drive to Las Vegas.
segments.cn: 我们会开车去拉斯维加斯。

segments.en: Really?
Yeah, so that's really fun.
A bunch of crazy guys in a car going to Las Vegas, and then just having fun and talking about everything.
segments.cn: 一群疯狂的家伙在车里去拉斯维加斯，玩得很开心，聊各种事情。

segments.en: So that's a much different experience than a family road trip.
segments.cn: 所以这和家庭公路旅行是完全不同的体验。

segments.en: Maybe that sounds a little bit more fun.
segments.cn: 也许听起来更有趣一些。

segments.en: Yeah, eight hours in a car is not really that boring with all your friends.
segments.cn: 是啊，和朋友在车里待八小时并不无聊。

segments.en: All right, folks, we're out of time for today, but be sure to visit our website at EnglishPod.com and leave all your questions and comments.
segments.cn: 好吧，大家，今天的时间到了，但一定要访问我们的网站 EnglishPod.com，留下你们的问题和评论。

segments.en: Okay, well, thanks for listening, and until next time, goodbye!
segments.cn: 好的，谢谢收听，下次再见，拜拜！

segments.en: Bye!
